bio: I am a "sunbather" in the Sonne discord (og member that helps answer people)
contributionDescription:
I have been very active in the Sonne discord: being present daily + answering questions, which helps educate new members.

I hope to pump out educational content on my Twitter, as I am also very active there, spreading the word on "worthy" projects.

I have been very active in crypto since 2016 and feel I can help beginners get up to speed with the basics.
impactDescription:
I have been extremely consistent in being present within discord and twitter; helping new members wrap their head around current events / important information / etc.

I truly hope to ramp this up (especially on Twitter), as I have a deep passion for crypto
